field.name: RLCE
field.description: Correctable Error Status. When set, indicates that correctable system error occurred.

field.name: RLNE
field.description: Non-fatal Error Status. When set, indicates that non-fatal system error occurred.

field.name: RLFE
field.description: Fatal Error Status. When set, indicates that fatal system error occurred.

field.name: RCPE
field.description: PME Status. When set, indicates that the remote PCIE device signalled a Power Management Event.

field.name: RCTO
field.description: PME Turn Off Acknowledge status. When set, indicates that a PME_TO_Ack messages was received.

field.name: PINA
field.description: INTA status. When set, indicates that legacy INTA interrupt is asserted.

field.name: PINB
field.description: INTB status. When set, indicates that legacy INTB interrupt is asserted.

field.name: PINC
field.description: INTC status. When set, indicates that legacy INTC interrupt is asserted.

field.name: PIND
field.description: INTD status. When set, indicates that legacy INTD interrupt is asserted.

field.name: ALER
field.description: ASPM L1Enter request status. Asserted when a PM_Active_State_Request_L1 DLLP is received.

field.name: CRSE
field.description: CRS status. Asserted a configuration request is completed by the destination with Configuration Retry Status (CRS).
